page.title: 04FACHELL FARM FIRST PAGE.
page.content: Situated on the eastern side of{ {St.Asaph Avenue,}the farm is owned by Mr.Gareth Parry in partnership with his brother.The farm has been in the possession of this family for 142 years.The original buildings date to before 1770,the "new" farmhouse from 1898.The estimated value of the farm in 1985 is Â£1,800 per acre.Given the availability of land,it is intended to expand the farm.Present size is 228 acres. 70 acres are devoted to{CASH CROPS},40 acres for{Barley}with half the yield for cattle fodder and the other half being sold to breweries.30 acres are under{Wheat}which is all sold for flour milling.The Parry brothers employ only 1 employee,and they themselves average a 12 hour day for 50 weeks of the year.
